description: A portal that is made specifically for you! Play around with the community's features as soon as they are shipped, supporting JOSA in developing new ones.
name: JOSA Community

description: Pintrest's SnapPass, It's like SnapChat... for passwords, it was rebranded as Safepass by JOSA, but it was aborted.
name: Safepass v2

description: JOSA has hosted a Mastodon server, but it got no attention from the surrounding community.
name: JOSA's Mastodon Host

description: DSP (Digital Safety Portal) was killed when trying to rebrand it to "Aman Raqami"
name: Digital Safety Portal
